page.title: 09DOCTOR'S SURGERY
page.content: When you are ill and are able to get to the surgery you ring the bell and a nurse/receptionist gives you a ticket with a number and {A or S}on. {A}is for Dr.Aldridge {S}is for Dr.Slater. You then sit down and wait for the doctor.There is a board on the wall which gives the names of the doctors and says next paient.When it is time for the next person to go in a buzzer goes and a green light lights up on the word next patient by the doctor's name and you put your ticket in a pot that says used tickets and go in to the doctor.He opens one of his drawers and gets out your card and then examines you. He gives you a prescription which you take to the dispensary and they give you the medicine you need.If you are too ill to go to the surgery you phone up and the doctor comes to your house.
